Surrounded by Sensors

15 September 2010

In Physical Computing last week, Tom Igoe asked us to take photos of sensors we encountered on our daily commute from home to ITP. It was an interesting exercise; we are surrounded by little observers.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
